articles.author: Celina Tebor and N'dea Yancey-Bragg, USA TODAY
articles.title: Ukraine moves closer to EU candidacy; Families of 2 missing American veterans speak out: Latest updates - USA TODAY
articles.description: On Friday, President Joe Biden said he'd been briefed on the Americans missing in Ukraine and urged others not to travel there. Latest updates.
articles.content:
The executive arm of the European Union recommended Friday that Ukraine become a candidate for membership, the first step in a process that could take decades.
